plugins.name: JS Beautify
plugins.description: Cleans up the formatting of your JavaScript code using jsbeautifier.

plugins.name: JavaScript outliner
plugins.description: Provides a simple tree view of the functions in a JavaScript file.

plugins.name: Nonymous outline
plugins.description: Provides a tree view of JavaScript functions using the "Function-Object Consumption" algorithm to generate meaningful names for anonymous functions.

plugins.name: CodeMirror
plugins.description: Uses CodeMirror modes to highlight your code.

plugins.name: HTML Outline
plugins.description: Provides a hierarchical outline of the elements in an HTML file.

plugins.name: Esprima outline
plugins.description: Uses the esprima JavaScript parser to provide a detailed outline of your JavaScript code.

plugins.name: Esprima content assist
plugins.description: Offers completion and type inference for JavaScript files. (Comes included with Orion 1.0+)

plugins.name: HTML5 local filesystem
plugins.description: Enables you to use Orion to work with files and folders in an HTML5 file system stored on your local computer.

plugins.name: Amazon S3 filesystem
plugins.description: Provides access to an Amazon S3 bucket as a filesystem. See README for installation instructions.

plugins.name: ToRGB
plugins.description: Converts an r,g,b decimal to hex #RRGGBB for use in CSS.

plugins.name: Pixlr
plugins.description:
Provides integration with Pixlr, the online image editor. Allows Pixlr to open images from your Orion workspace, and save files back to Orion.

Deprecated: This plugin is experimental and is no longer maintained. May not function correctly.

plugins.name: String Externalizer
plugins.description: Helps you externalize strings in your JavaScript code. Read more here.

plugins.name: Projects Prototype
plugins.description: Enable the prototype of supporting Projects within Orion. Adds a banner item for Projects

plugins.name: Snippet
plugins.description: Editor command to create an HTML code snippet from a selection in your editor. Read more here.

plugins.name: Double2Single
plugins.description: Editor command to convert double quotes to single. Read more here.

plugins.name: Line Delimiter Converter
plugins.description: This plugin provides a editor commands to convert line delimiters to DOS or UNIX.
